outcome: Halden’s death is revealed as an elaborate deception: he faked his death with assistance from inside the Council. His hidden communications ignite a citywide hunt for the real Halden, fracturing the Council and destabilizing the BCI.

events.description: A Harmonist-aligned technician uncovers evidence that biometric data tied to Halden’s death was falsified. A secret corridor in Tower 9 is found, raising suspicion that Halden escaped.
Anonymous messages circulate: Halden may be alive and broadcasting from an unknown location. Citizens flood the feedback portal with questions, sowing panic and curiosity citywide.
Council factions turn on one another as Innovators and Directorate officials accuse the Harmonists of orchestrating a cover-up. Emergency sessions are broadcast live for the first time in years.
Stenograd enters a state of open unrest as citizens launch coordinated efforts to unmask the truth behind Halden’s death. Rogue groups hack BCI nodes seeking answers, amplifying political chaos.
